dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S963 IS: Preventing an Unrealistic FMAP Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Coburn (for himself, Mr. Burr, Mr. Graham, Mr. Isakson, and Mr. Barrasso) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: Preventing an unrealistic future Medicaid augmentation plan.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Preventing an Unrealistic FMAP Act.

section.header: Preventing an unrealistic Federal medical assistance percentage by repealing the Affordable Care Act enhanced Federal medical assistance percentages for Medicaid expansions

subsection.text: Section 1905 of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1396d) is amended by striking subsections (y) and (z).
Section 1905 of such Act (42 U.S.C. 1396d) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the first sentence of subsection (b)—

subparagraph.text: by striking subsections (y), (z), and and inserting subsection; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (aa), in each of paragraphs (1)(A), (2)(A), and (3), by striking , subsections (y) and (z), each place it appears; and
in subsection (cc), by striking subsections (y), (z), and and inserting subsection.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall take effect on the earlier of—

paragraph.text: the date of enactment of this Act; or
